pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit必須)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
